song.title: Revelation
song.info:
**** Revelation PC-S3M (c)basehead/acid 1994 sams: bit composed in about 45 minutes with the wonderful tracker = st3 by psi/fc. this one was made during an intense heatwave and at about 100% humidity... it's too damn hot! anyway, enjoy the tune...
(release version) 6.16.94
